website_summaries.verdict: A mild, non-irritating natural formula at a fair price.
pros: A non-toxic broad-spectrum sunscreen that provides moderate SPF 30 protection
Natural ingredients are safe for face and body, and are rated to be tear-free
Can be used on children as young as 6 months
The product is also rich in antioxidants and botanicals like white tea, chamomile, and lavender
cons: This sunscreen may leave a white film on skin

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t protect us from the sun
customer_reviews.text: Not worth buying. We took this to Hawaii because it was reef safe. We applied it liberally and often and my wife and I both burned, badly. We have a two year old and thank goodness he wasn’t with us because he’d have been worse off with this poor product. Disappointing waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: ReadTheBook

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like the white film on face
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this feels on my face. It is thicker than brands like Neutragena and i like the mild fragrance. BUT, it does leave a faint white film my face, no matter how well I rub it in. I will continue to use it for times of long sun exposure - like at beach or long walks, but I won’t for regular activities where I don’t want anything to whiten my already pale face. I think every brand that has zinc oxide will do this.
customer_reviews.author: Jenlou

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but the best I've used
customer_reviews.text: Not greasy, seems to work well. Like all non-nano zinc sunscreens, it does go on a bit white but it fades in a few minutes. Not the best under makeup though, a bit, um, smeary -- it kind of lays on top of the skin a bit, doesn't absorb completely. But so far the best all natural, non-toxic facial sunscreen I've found so far, and I've tried quite a few.
customer_reviews.author: Denovan

customer_reviews.title: Good performance! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This continues to be my go-to brand for my family and myself. I'm both fair skinned and have a photo-sensitivity disorder, and this product works just fine for me. It does go on a little white, so you have to carefully rub it in. I use a face powder over it, when I'm concerned about looking shiny. It does not bother my sensitive skin, and it's only mildly irritating if I get it in my eyes. It does not sting or burn my eyes or skin. I started off the year using what I had left from last year, and it seems to have maintained its efficacy/potency. I highly recommend this brand of sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: NickStar

customer_reviews.title: High zinc which is good for sun protection
customer_reviews.text: High zinc which is good for sun protection. I am always looking for physical sunscreen but unfortunately I am still looking. This one is ok, still makes my face white. Texture is creamy, not gritty like some and the smell is very pleasant. I wear it at home but I will not wear it when I go out since it makes my face a little white
customer_reviews.author: hello shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for easy days! Not super sweat-resistant.
customer_reviews.text: This has a great smell - light and fresh. It goes on cleanly and I don’t feel covered in gross like I do with other sunscreens. Being reef-safe is why I bought it but it’s exceeded my expectations. Minus one star because it isn’t as water-resistant as I’d hoped based on its description. Outside without sweating much - no sunburn. Sweaty - sunburn in less than an hour. So reapply often or pick something else if you’re going to sweat a lot. I would still buy again though as most days I’m not going to need that kind of sunscreen. It works for walking outside, gardening, etc.
customer_reviews.author: S. LeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Protects my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Best sun protection for my eczema acne prone adult skin. The consistency is not too thick or chalky; the color does disappear quickly while providing a nice sheer moisturized look. Ive tried every sunscreen but stick to my Dermatologists recommendation to use mineral (natural, minimal ingredients, avoid irritants) even if the trade off for the reflective sunscreen appears more white/chalky. Mineral sunscreens protect by reflecting damaging uv rays while chemical convert. From personal experience I would also recommend this effective sunscreen for others who have a sun sensitivity due to medications & those in hot humid weather. It’s a good lightweight face moisturizer or combine with few drops of sweet almond oil (dryer skin types). Apply, enjoy & repeat accordingly!
customer_reviews.author: Red pet

customer_reviews.title: Natural, easy to apply, smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen - goes on smooth, without white streaks, and smells nice. I have used several types of sunscreen, including Badger, California Baby. Will definitely order this natural sunscreen again!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle De Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Dependable Sun Protection
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite sunscreen out of the many 'organic' type of sunscreens I have tried. I am sun-sensitive and get pre-cancer rough spots on my face and lips if I do not use heavy block. This works great, is not greasy and is dependable. Other natural brands have not always been so dependable as they seem to separate easily and you end up applying it without the protection you need. It smells fine also. It does turn you somewhat 'white' and I use this on my face only as it is thick and not easy to apply like a thinner, greasier type lotion,
customer_reviews.author: ChrisTop Contributor: Mountain Biking

customer_reviews.title: This is my second order of the sunscreen. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of the sunscreen. I wear sunscreen everyday on my face because I am scared of aging and skin cancer although I'm no out in the sun a lot. The main reason why I chose this was the all natural ingredients in the sunscreen. I try not to use a lot of chemical products on my face and this product is it. It took me a few months to finish the first tube , a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Food Roll

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised and Saves the Reefs
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research to identify a couple of mineral based sunscreens to use while scuba diving in Belize and the Cayman Islands. Out of all the products available, I purchased TotLogic Natural Mineral Sunscreen and Blue Lizard Sensitive Skin Mineral Sunscreen. A friend of mine used the TotLogic sunscreen while we were in the Cayman Islands and absolutely loved it. So much so, she requested that I buy her a tube of it for Christmas in anticipation of our dive trip to Bonaire. My friend is very picky about what she uses on her skin, so her approval of TotLogic says volumes about it's quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Reef-safe sun protection
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is pretty awesome. It rubs in well with only minor lightening of the skin -- no creepy ghost face! My husband and I still burned, but we spent a lot of time in the water, so that could be due to human error. The best part about this sunscreen is that it is reef-safe. Too many of the "reef-safe" sunscreens on the market today actually have horrific ingredients in them. If your sunscreen contains oxybenzone, butylparaben, octinoxate, 4-methylbenzylidine camphor, or any other unnatural sounding ingredients, please don't use it anywhere near water, unless it's your own inland swimming pool!
customer_reviews.author: TAS

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I use it just about every day for commuting in the FL sun. I mix it with my foundation and add an extra layer on my nose, cheeks, and forehead. This is not something I sweat in regularly, although I think it would perform decently. I prefer higher SPF for when I’m exercising for longer periods outdoors. However, mixed with foundation, it seems to work well for daily use without a white cast. Also not harmful for coral reefs and no questionable ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our cruise because I wanted a safe sunscreen for the ocean. This went on easily, great protection and water resistance. This will be a go to. So glad there are brands like this one that are safe for children and our environment.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly kale

customer_reviews.title: Lack of smell, goes on clear with no whiteness.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sunscreen product. Some reviews have said they had a problem with it turning your skin white. It doesn't do that to me at all. And the total lack of smell is great! I am extremely sensitive to any smells after going through chemo and also very concerned about getting skin cancer. I highly recommend this product because once I put it on I don't even know it's there.
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: It is a really good sunblock! I use this product the other day ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a really good sunblock! I use this product the other day and realized that I didn’t need to reapply even after spending more than four hours at the beach. Obviously I wouldn’t recommend doing this but I was surprised that my skin which usually burns really bad was able to be protected by the sun. It is awesome also to know that it also protects the reef. My skin is also very sensitive and it did not have a reaction with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jnisthal

customer_reviews.title: Works well and doesn't leave you looking like casper
customer_reviews.text: Needed a natural sunscreen for a trip to hawaii but was dubious based on all mediocre reviews for the various natural sunscreens. This one worked far and away the best among those I tried - used it on my face for the entire week I was in Hawaii and never got burned. It goes on slightly "whiter" and requires a bit more rubbing in than a standard sunscreen, but pretty quickly absorbs and does not leave you looking like a ghost. I have relatively sensitive skin (tend to get heat rash) and did not have any issues with this - actually planning to start using it instead of a standard sunscreen even when I'm in non-reef areas.
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: Still got sunburned
customer_reviews.text: Still got sunburned. Went on thick. Used it in Mexico in January, probably should have gone with a more traditional sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sutter

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and effective
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. My skin is finicky and I've tried a lot of different products and sunscreens. I can read down an ingredient list now and be able to tell whether or not something is going to break me out. I was very pleased with the ingredients in this. It leaves a matte finish which is nice for those of us who are more oily. I will buy again once I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I applied TotLogic sunscreen before going on a float trip and five times during the trip. My entire body is sunburnt. This is a useless product and you should not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive babies
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has sensitive skin/eczema so I try to use only natural and organic skincare items on her, but when it came to sunscreen she couldn’t even tolerate the Babyganics sunscreen. This Totlogic Sunscreen has been the only one that works for her. It smells good, goes on smooth, and works well. I’ll be buying it again!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy.
customer_reviews.text: I've just used the product one time so far as I'm on vacation. You do have to rub it in quite a lot so that you don't have a film of whiteness on your skin. It rained the day I was at the beach and I noticed that droplets of rain formed on my skin where I had rubbed in the lotion. The droplets were "sitting" in top of my skin which I guess shows how the sun also blocks the sun from damaging the skin?? In any case, if the product doesn't contain all the chemical ingredients that others do, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda23

customer_reviews.title: Non Toxic to environment/ good to your skin
customer_reviews.text: First off..this product has a light and inoffensive fragrance so you dont smell like a tropical cocktail at spring break. Second, it goes on easily and is not gummy or tacky. Thirdly, it leaves a nice sheen to the skin but no white cast at all and without feeling greasy. Then, to top it all off, its effective and best of all... SAFE for our streams, lakes and oceans! Win Win!
customer_reviews.author: glam giver

customer_reviews.title: This sunscreen gave me and my daughter the worse rash. After a couple of days of using ...
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen gave me and my daughter the worse rash. After a couple of days of using the lotion we developed a bad rash that made our skin feel like it was on fire. After I discontinued the use of the lotion I was left with alligator skin for two weeks. After 3 weeks my skin is finally back to normal but I was in agony.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Great zinc based sunscreen that blends into your skin
customer_reviews.text: Works into all kinds of skin pretty well for a zinc based sunscreen. A group of friends and I tried it before swimming and hiking and no one looked ghostly because of the sunscreen, it blended in well and no one got sun burnt, even me, and I'm so white I'm see through. I've since tried it on long car trips too and it works great and doesn't have a bad smell in close quarters.
customer_reviews.author: chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Nice sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is a healthy product and good for environment. It goes on smoothly and as some have said it does go on with a white tinge...this does absorb and fades. I haven’t had a chance to test the water proof side.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Juette

customer_reviews.title: Becomes very greasy in the sun
customer_reviews.text: I used this sunscreen before going to the pool on a hot summer day. The warmer I got, the more greasy the lotion became. I felt super greasy and wanted to shower as soon as I returned home.
customer_reviews.author: MKeswick

customer_reviews.title: Good sunscreen but thick.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but goes on thick. If you prefer a lighter sunscreen then don't pick this one. I know there are other reef friendly sunscreens that are lighter and effective. This has an almost paste-like quality to it. A little thick for my tastes.
customer_reviews.author: Cafe Farrago

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: My kids usually have allergy reaction to many sunscreen brands, but they don't have any problem with this product. However, I have dry skin and I feel somewhat dry after I put this product on. So, if you have dry skin, I'd like to recommend you to use extra moisturizer with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Dong Joon

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff! Good coverage without leaving that zinc look
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! Good coverage without leaving that zinc look, you know, the white film that won't entirely go away. Spent a few hours in a canoe on a lake and no burn at all. Glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff worked great. Perfect for traveling to those delicate environments where they want you to wear biodegradeable sunscreen. I understand Hawaii is soon going to be requiring this as well.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Giles

customer_reviews.title: No burns here
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering Totlogic sunscreen mainly because I scuba dive and it is reef safe, but secondly because it stays on since it is Zinc based. I have not even come close to burning and rarely reapply.
customer_reviews.author: R. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Non-toxic, safe for hypersensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: loved the product! just spent a weekend on a cruise ship. i have atopic dermatitis which is relatively under control so have never liked the chemicals in sunscreen.. after loads of research i decided on this.. trying on myself before i go with grandson to caribbean! if i can handle it so can he, right? Right! i am not burned. no horrid rashes from toxic chemicals! i love Totlogic and highly recommend! i have a golden tan!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy E. Holt

customer_reviews.title: Best quality reef safe sunblock
customer_reviews.text: Truly the best of 7 reef safe sunblocks I tried. They will all leave a white coating but this one was the easiest to spread, stayed on for long even after being in pool and ocean, protected well, did not have any micro beads like others that I tried, smelled GOOD, and was the least oily. I will only purchase this one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It came exactly as advertised as it did not have any odor, dried really fast on skin, and didn’t irritate my son’s skin. I’d recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: MyN. L.

customer_reviews.title: Eco friendly but not good protection
customer_reviews.text: We recently went on vacation and were required to wear biodegradable sunscreen. I did not find it to be as effective as regular sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Great natural sunscreen for kids or anyone really
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this sunscreen on our 6 yo son for several years. It rubs on easily. Especially compared to the many many other kinds of natural sunscreens we’ve tried. Provides great sun protection for him even with him spending the majority of his time in the water. Highly recommend this Product.
customer_reviews.author: MJE

customer_reviews.title: best mineral sunscream
customer_reviews.text: this sunscreen is great , has lots of protection 20% of zinc and is super gentle doesn't burn your eyes , love it
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Spreads on easily, leaves no residue, rated well by the EWG
customer_reviews.text: It's taken some trial and error, but I've finally found a daily facial sunscreen that seems to work, doesn't leave a waxy white residue, and receives a 1 on the Environmental Working Group's rating (1 meaning that the ingredients are not known to be toxic). I use this daily and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: lizms

customer_reviews.title: Best natural sunscreen I've tried to date!
customer_reviews.text: I stumbled across TotLogic Sunscreen after trying the companies' other products LiceLogic and then the TotLogic Hairspray, both of which I loved! Originally got it for my kids, but now everyone in my family uses it! Goes on nice and smoothly but not oily like other creams, and it has a very nice mild fragrance. It definitely protects everyone from harmful rays. I highly recommend !!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent
customer_reviews.text: Strong, off-putting scent. And a bit greasier than competitive zinc sunscreens.
customer_reviews.author: bf9

customer_reviews.title: Not effective, still got sunburn
customer_reviews.text: Even though I used this for a couple hours surfing, I still got burned pretty badly.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny2Penny

customer_reviews.title: Got burnt to a crisp
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I wore this sunscreen out on a whale shark adventure and got fried. We reapplied as instructed. Total waste of $15
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Brosch

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to absorb
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is reed safe and natural but it is very difficult to rub in. You cannot rub it into a beard at all.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer2

customer_reviews.title: Great, light and effective
customer_reviews.text: Great, light and effective. The first natural titanium oxide sunscreen I've used that rubs in and doesn't feel heavy or leave a creepy hue, unless they were extremely expensive. I will definitely buy again and reccomend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Maui Jill

customer_reviews.title: This sunscreen is super awesome. I really like it because it does ...
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is super awesome. I really like it because it does not have chemicals in it that irritate or make your eyes burn and is so far my very favorite sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice consistency
customer_reviews.text: We especially liked this product because it was not as pasty and difficult to rub in as similar products.
customer_reviews.author: GraceC

customer_reviews.title: Very recommend for people with sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Had no allergy to it yet, good quality product for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: olesya

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We snorkeling quite a bit in the Caribbean. so we purchase this product. It did a great job and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G. Huebner

customer_reviews.title: Thick
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I ordered this was the ‘natural’ factor but I really wasn’t impressed with the consistency. It’s so incredibly thick and sticky and leaves you looking pale too. Some of it transferred from my back into my hair and left the tips of my hair really matted and greasy. I suppose if you don’t mind thick creams it’s not that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Storm Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is very creamy and doesn't dry out your skin as much as other brands, however, I've read mixed reports of whether or not it is truly reef safe.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I wore this snorkeling and it worked very well. As with all sunscreen, you do have to re-apply after a few hours of sunshine. But it has a pleasant smell and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: C Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Reef safe, protect our coral!!
customer_reviews.text: Check size, kinda small for the price, but we needed next day. Wanted reef safe, so satisfied. Would not use for regular summertime use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was great for Florida Sun
customer_reviews.text: I was really worried about the hot sun in Florida and I hate all the greasy things on market. I did not get sunburn and my skin felt most on smooth instead of dry and parched after a day at the beach. I used it on my granddaughter and felt safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: The product is so small. There are equally as good products for much cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had no issue with this product as most sunscreens irritate her skin.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen - even works a bit as a coverup. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All-around winner!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. I hate the chalky white residue that so many natural sunblocks leave on skin, but TotLogic actually does become invisible as soon as it’s absorbed. Amazing for such good sun protection. Five stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Thundarrgirl

customer_reviews.title: It blends better than most zinc sunscreens I've used
customer_reviews.text: I mostly used this on my face, and somewhat on my arms and shoulders and neck. It blends better than most zinc sunscreens I've used, and did not make my sensitive and acne prone face break out. Yay! I found myself mixing it with my face cream for an easier rub-in.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime White

customer_reviews.title: TotLogic keeps you from burning
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a reef safe sunscreen for a vacation full of snorkeling. TotLogic kept us from burning and we were in a lot of water and sun. As with all zinc oxide based sunscreens you have to rub it in well, but it worked well and that's what we hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: WG

customer_reviews.title: I really like this sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sunscreen. I purchased this for myself. I like that it does not smell like sunscreen and a little goes a long way. I have already purchased more for my family!
customer_reviews.author: CathyNault

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. My husband can’t wear most sunscreens but this one doesn’t cause any reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Net

customer_reviews.title: Super Protection From The Sun That Works!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve tried a bunch of natural sunscreens, and this one is by the far the best. We spend a lot of time outside and we’ve used Totlogic Sunscreen for about a year and it does a great job. Easy to apply and great value and most importantly, natural without any harsh chemicals. Recommend this for year round use.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett M. Lieberman

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars cause I only tried it to see if ...
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars cause I only tried it to see if it felt greasy. Seems legit. Not 100% sure if it's reef safe.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was promising at first as it seemed to absorb ...
customer_reviews.text: It was promising at first as it seemed to absorb into my skin well without too much white, but then after a few days, it started giving me major zits so I had to stop using it. Went back to Vanicream.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Not for me for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: This product is not going to be an everyday use product for me. I would like a truly all natural (minus zinc oxide product). I would use it lightly in the Florida sun which can be quite intense.
customer_reviews.author: Herman On the Path

customer_reviews.title: No white nose
customer_reviews.text: Rubs in better than most zinc sunscreens I've used, and lasts through sweat. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is the first sunscreen I've found that does not irritate my skin. I'm allergic to most of the extra added on ingredients in other sunscreens. It does go on white like other reviews say, but it rubs in well and does it's job. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Was out in the sun all day and it worked great.I find this sun screen works great on my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sunscreen for my daughter and I.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I use this sunscreen on our face. We live in Florida and we need all the protection we can get and we have never had a burn. It is great for sensitive screen and really stays on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Fro1toto

customer_reviews.title: Very effective and goes on smoothly.
customer_reviews.text: Very effective sunscreen and it was nice to know we weren't harming the marine environment. It also applies easier than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! My new favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works!! I have searched for a eco friendly sunscreen for a log time that feels good, is easy to apply and protects my sensitive skin. This one does the job brilliantly!
customer_reviews.author: don

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size since I’m only taking a carry on and works for planes! I haven’t tried it out yet but I’m super excited and can’t wait!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have super sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only sunscreen I have found that does not cause my skin to have a reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!!! A natural sunscreen that works!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!! I have tried lots, but none seem to do as good as this one! :)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Love the sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Great product, excellent service and speedy delivery. Thank you for making the buying experience so delightful! Love the sunscreen! This is my second time purchasing them:)
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Organic Sunblock
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an outing my daughter and I were attending. Totlogic worked perfectly. Just as described too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product, doesn't make your face white
customer_reviews.text: Great product, doesn't make your face white, no oxybenzone, but now amazon doesn't have it. I'll order it from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The sunscreen works very well, covers evenly without having to use very much. I have already re-ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: HERBERT

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is great for sensitive skin. My 2 year old broke out in a horrible rash with Neutrogena brand so we tried this stuff and it works awesome. No rash and protects him from the sun!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Lawler

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve purchased this product. We love it! Great safe protection from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Smelly
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the smell of this product. There are better ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Great natural product that protects against the sun.
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is easy to put on and lasts a long time. A little goes a long way too and great for daily use. I look forward to applying it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is safe for you and the environment! I wear it in the pool for an hour and it still protects after I get out.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Peterson

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t swam yet while using this product but I like that it’s safe and effective and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have white film and is sticky
customer_reviews.text: It looks white on my face and it is not completely absorbed. My face is sticky. I'm not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Nice to Have a Safe Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I had Skin Cancer on my face and it is nice to have a safe option in sunscreens.
customer_reviews.author: JanetEC

customer_reviews.title: I love the fresh smell and feel
customer_reviews.text: I love the fresh smell and feel, not greasy. I especially like the idea that it is free pf phthalates, parabens and aluminum.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: Great sunscreen!! I have sensitive skin and have tried many brands, this one being my favorite. Reliable sun protection without the sticky and greasy texture, but keeping your skin hydrated. The fact that it’s truly water resistant and has a nice scent are a plus compared to many other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Santos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Great protection for my skin and safe for the reefs while snorkeling in the Bahamas!
customer_reviews.author: Beth K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product has a full list of good non-toxic ingredients. I am excited to try it out this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great but can leave a small white sheen on your skin. Make sure to rub it in thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Heywood Jablowme

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I got this sunscreen for a recent cruise since we would be in the ocean some and I wanted a biodegradable sunscreen. This claims to be. I liked it a lot better than the last biodegradable sunscreen I tried as it goes on smoothly without flaking. I didn't get burned so it obviously works.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Light and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and not greasy. Goes on light and stays on.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Capanelli

customer_reviews.title: This product is great; good sunscreen without feeling greasy or turning white
customer_reviews.text: This product is great; good sunscreen without feeling greasy or turning white. I haven't swam in it, I user it mostly for hiking and biking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far. For a natural sunscreen, it's the best one I've used recently/
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: ... the only person on the trip that didn't get horrible sunburn because of this
customer_reviews.text: Was the only person on the trip that didn't get horrible sunburn because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Olson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have a quality sunscreen with zinc. Entire family uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cream is very thick and hard to rub in ...
customer_reviews.text: The cream is very thick and hard to rub in,but might be due to the ingredients required to be reef friendly
customer_reviews.author: Nanny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best natural sunscreen I have found...and I have tested a lot!
customer_reviews.author: annab

product_meta.title: TotLogic Natural Mineral Sunscreen SPF 30, 3 oz | Biodegradable Reef Safe Zinc Oxide Organic Sunblock For Kids | Hypoallergenic, Water Resistant Non Nano Formula
feature_bullets: FUN IN THE SUN IS FINALLY SAFE! Our kids mineral based sunscreen provides broad-spectrum protection against dangerous UVA and UVB rays. The hypoallergenic gentle formula contains 20% natural zinc oxide, making it perfect for tots’ sensitive skin! Use on face and body for infants ages 6 months and up.

PROTECT YOUR BABY, SAVE MOTHER EARTH: With a #1 rating for EWG safety its eco-friendly performance and non-toxic, biodegradable formula, our sunscreen is non-comedogenic, sweat-resistant and water-resistant for up to 80 minutes. It’s also super safe for the ocean, sea life and coral reef, a win-win for parents—and the planet!

A SUNBLOCK THAT GROWS WITH THEM: Our gentle, non-irritating kids sunblock is a smart solution for all skin types! From half a year through the terrible twos and beyond, enjoy an awesome everyday baby sunscreen that’s beloved by moms more than any other product on the market.

FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY: Safe for children, used by all members of the family. Used as a base under makeup by women and great for people with sensitive skin or face. Gain peace of mind knowing our stuff is vegan-safe, cruelty-free and non-nano. Our zinc oxide sunscreen contains no parabens, phthalates, artificial fragrances, dyes or other harsh ingredients.

RICH IN ANTIOXIDANTS & BOTANICALS: Tote our handy travel size mineral sunscreen with you everywhere you go! Infused with white tea, jojoba oil, hyaluronic acid, arnica, soothing chamomile and lavender, this infant sunblock leaves an all-natural scent while keeping their skin soft all day long.
